name: Riley Exploration Permian, Inc.
description: Riley Exploration Permian, Inc. is an independent energy company focused on the acquisition, exploration, and development of oil and natural gas reserves in the Permian Basin, one of the most prolific oil-producing regions in the United States. Founded in 2017, Riley Exploration leverages advanced technology and a highly experienced management team to maximize production efficiency and enhance shareholder value. The company operates a diverse portfolio of high-quality assets, emphasizing sustainable practices and responsible resource management. With a strategic approach to capital allocation, Riley ensures that it remains agile and adaptable in the ever-changing energy market. The firm is committed to maintaining a strong balance sheet, which allows it to capitalize on growth opportunities while navigating the inherent volatility of the energy sector. By integrating innovative drilling techniques and optimizing well performance, Riley Exploration aims to deliver robust operational results and foster long-term sustainability. The company is also dedicated to environmental stewardship, actively seeking to minimize its ecological footprint while generating energy that powers communities and drives economic growth.
